description: {"blocks":[{"key":"74s6q","text":"Media preparation for in vitro propagation of plantlets.  Validated for cassava in tissue culture.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.funder_name: Realizing Increased Photosynthetic Efficiency (RIPE) that is funded by the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, Foundation for Food and Agriculture Research, and the U.K. Foreign, Commonwealth & Development Office

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"6b079","text":"Thoroughly sterilize all materials and work surfaces before pouring media.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"m56s","text":"Use sterile technique after autoclaving, when pouring media into containers.  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5mt3u","text":"Wear a lab coat and clean gloves that have been thoroughly soaked in 70% ethanol during media pouring.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4bh34","text":"Do not turn off laminar flow hood blower fans during media setting time.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1klr8","text":"Do not leave UV light on once media is in the flow hood.  The UV light will damage the vitamin content of the media.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
